attributes.action: PETITION AGAINST NEW ALDI STORE - DOXFORD PARK SUNDERLAND
attributes.additional_details:
Aldi propose to introduce a new neighbourhood food store on the site of the Croftside House, adjacent to Doxford Park Way and Hall Farm Road.

The majority of local residents are opposed to the idea. Concerns include; traffic, Visual Impact, Need and Location.

More information can be found on the Doxford Park and Tunstall Residents Facebook Page:

https://www.facebook.com/Doxford.residents

PLEASE SIGN THIS ONLINE PETITION IF YOU ARE AGAINST THE BUILDING OF AN ALDI STORE AT DOXFORD PARK, SUNDERLAND.
